    Class RegisteredEventConsumerSystem<DISPATCHER, COMMAND, ELEMENT>

    Base class for any registry based event consumer.

    Inheritance
    Object
    RegisteredEventConsumerSystem<DISPATCHER, COMMAND, ELEMENT>
    EffectConsumerSystem<ELEMENT>
    Namespace: Wayn.Mgm.Events
    Assembly: cs.temp.dll.dll
    Syntax
    public abstract class RegisteredEventConsumerSystem<DISPATCHER, COMMAND, ELEMENT> : SystemBase where DISPATCHER : RegistryEventDispatcher<COMMAND> where COMMAND : struct, IEventRegistryCommand where ELEMENT : struct, IRegistryElement
    Type Parameters
    Name Description
    DISPATCHER

    The type of the dispatcher for the registry based event system..
    COMMAND

    The type of the command for the registry based event system.
    ELEMENT

    The type of the event consumed by the system.

    Fields

    _dispatcherSystem

    System that takes care of dispatching the event based on their type.

    Type Description

    Methods

    GetRegistryInstance()

    Method to delegate the registery instance retreival to the child class because the singleton instance cant be retreived from the generic type.

    Declaration

    Returns
    Type Description
